name: Auto Shutdown PC
short_description:
This program is designed to be used with netflixs or other online movie and tv shows providers
It is so you can set an auto shutdown for when the movie ends in the event you fall asleep and leave your pc on at night.

You click on the pre selected times  that are designed for the length of a standard tv show or movie or set your own time.

Designed to be quick. No "are you sure" ect. Program closes and message is displayed to say when the pc will shut itself down.
When you launch the program. All previous shutdowns will be stopped. If you decide against the shutdown at a later stage. just open the program and close it.
summary: Auto Shutdown for Tv and Movies
